content.en: Shape-from-shading advancements: Scientists have been exploring different algorithms to recover shape and surface details from shaded images. They have compared the performance of various shape-from-shading algorithms, developed new direct and iterative algorithms, and proposed a Bayesian approach to shape recovery. Additionally, they have investigated methods to reduce oversmoothing, cancel the effect of albedo variation, and estimate illuminant direction, albedo, and shape from shading information. These advancements in mathematical and numerical methods are helping researchers improve the accuracy and efficiency of shape-from-shading algorithms.
content.da: Shape-from-shading fremskridt: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at genvinde form og overfladedetaljer fra skyggebilleder. De har sammenlignet ydeevnen af forskellige shape-from-shading algoritmer, udviklet nye direkte og iterative algoritmer, og foreslået en Bayesiansk tilgang til formgenvinding. Desuden har de undersøgt metoder til at reducere oversmoothing, annullere effekten af albedovariation og estimere lyskildens retning, albedo og form ud fra skyggeinformation. Disse fremskridt i matematiske og numeriske metoder hjælper forskere med at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af shape-from-shading algoritmer.
